description: Support Space, Collaborative Furniture for the New Brunswick region. This contract is set aside for Indigenous Businesses and is set aside from International Trade Agreements. The contract has been amended 5 times with the most recent amendment being on 2024-01-25.

full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### English

**Title:** Purchase, Delivery, and Installation of Collaborative Furniture for the New Brunswick Region
**Reference Number:** cb-489-5558451
**Posting Date:** 2024-01-15
**Closes on:** 2024-01-25T14:00:00
**Solicitation Number:** 100025200

**Business Requirements:**

Employment and Social Development Canada is soliciting proposals for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating in the New Brunswick Region. The deadline for submission is January 25, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EST).

**Procurement Details:**

- **Supply Arrangement:** This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses and is available to pre-qualified Supply Arrangement holders only.
- **Product Category:** Category 6: Support Space—Collaborative Furniture
- **Delivery Location:** Moncton, New Brunswick
- **Delivery Date:** March 22, 2024

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The lowest price (responsive bid) will be considered the most economical option for this procurement. No security requirements are associated with this procurement.

**Pre-qualification Requirements:**

To be eligible to bid, suppliers must hold a valid Supply Arrangement under contract number E60PQ-140003/C. Interested suppliers may contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for information on becoming a pre-qualified supplier.

**Official Documents:**

The official tender documents are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders. Suppliers must submit their proposals electronically.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Kimberly Hutchings at NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca or (819) 360-6740.

#### French

**Title:** Achat, livraison et installation d'un espace de soutien et de mobilier de collaboration pour la région du Nouveau-Brunswick
**Reference Number:** cb-489-5558451
**Date d'anglais:** 2024-01-15
**Fermer sur:** 2024-01-25T14:00:00
**N° de sollicitation:** 100025200

**Exigences commerciales:**

Emploi et Développement social Canada
